page.title: 07NEWTONS POPULATION LOSSES.
page.content:
Newtonhas been an estate village for hundreds of years.In 1965 all its properties were put in trust for sale and the loss of population accelerated at this point as houses which became empty were not relet nor were they at once put up for sale.Only 8 houses have so far been sold and 5 others still stand empty.5 houses are still occupied by estate tenants.The slow sale of the properties may be the result of the estate trying to minimise the effect of Capital Gains Tax on the estate as a whole.
